thread.section_title: Tattoodo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tattoodo | tattoodo.com
thread.title: Rob Brown

author: Rob Brown
title: Rob Brown
text:
I spent over two years visiting and having long consultations with many tattoo establishments, with little or no success in them portraying the vision in my head.
With so many websites offering custom tattoos I thankfully came across TATTOODO! A godsend.
Such an informative and easy to use site who's communication has been exceptional, and with the reassurance of their money back guarantee if your needs are not met, you either get your money back or the tattoo you have been looking for.
The only issue I had was making my choice of the final winner! All the artist submissions were truly outstanding.
Would happily recommend and use again in the future.
QUITE SIMPLY! A WIN WIN, WITH A GUARANTEED RESULT.
